mapper.select: select id, thumbnail, title, coach_id as coachId, level, type1, type2, type3 from classes
mapper.insert: insert into classes (thumbnail, title, coach_id, level, type1, type2, type3) values (#{thumbnail}, #{title}, #{coachId}, #{level}, #{type1}, #{type2}, #{type3})
mapper.delete: delete from classes where id=#{id} and coach_id=#{coachId}
